description: This file contains CSS styles defining variables for theme management and styling rules for a front-end application layout.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling class with layout and color properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the application.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button that toggles the application's theme.
